name: My Xylophone Dreams: An RPG About Skeletons Passing Time
name_original: My Xylophone Dreams: An RPG About Skeletons Passing Time
description:
Ages ago, a team of stalwart adventurers went up against a powerful necromancer. The group struck a fatal blow against the villain… but not before a vile and powerful ritual was completed. The world died and millions of reanimated skeletons awoke without a master to serve.

In the centuries since, a new global society emerged… One without the need for food, water, medicine, sleep, or even air. One that would not age, grow sick, suffer poison, or experience pain. One lacking race, gender, sex, reproduction, responsibilities, or the threat of death. For many, it feels like a utopia.

Player characters are members of the masterless race. They are sentient skeletons which do not eat, drink, or breathe.

This is a draft. I'm looking for feedback.
